heroTitle: Meat from plants. Approved by meat lovers.
heroSubtitle: No animals. No weird stuff. Just really good food that happens to be plant-based.
statementTitle: We believe meat doesn't have to come from animals.
statementHighlight: It just has to taste incredible.
statementSubtitle: Made in Switzerland. B Corp certified. And honestly? It's really, really good.
locatorSubtitle: Find planted at your favourite store. We're basically everywhere now.
businessSubtitle: From Michelin stars to street food. We've got products, support, and free samples waiting.
footerTagline: Meat from plants. Approved by meat lovers.
